answers.answer: Hello,There are many causes which can lead to a bad body odour.Foods like garlic, onions, caffeine, alcohol and an imbalance in magnesium and zinc can cause excess sweating and bad odour.Poor hygiene, changing clothes infrequently, damp places like socks or T shirt can lead to flourishing of yeast and bacteria and produce an unpleasant odour.Liver disease, kidney disease, diabetes mellitus can produce a typical unpleasant odor as there is a change in consistency of sweat in these conditions. Excessive sweating due to hyperthyroidism could also lead to bad odor from the body. It is best to consult a doctor and get yourself evaluated for the cause. Treatment will depend on the cause. These possibilities are based on the information provided by you. Do keep us posted on how you are doing.Take care!
